content.question: Which of the following best explains how actions such as those described in the excerpt affected wartime mobilization?

choices.label: Many women experienced new economic and social opportunities.
The economic crisis deepened as a result of military spending.
Immigration declined because of improving unemployment rates.
The public widely rejected the internment of Japanese Americans.

content.answer: Many women experienced new economic and social opportunities.

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
